marklogic.body:
Shawn Michel - most of the time Kick never makes contact but opponent losses
Triple H - opponent gets his hands down just before hitting ground
Austin - stunner is the biggest seller in my opinion - look how opponent fly in air and lands 2 mtrs away
Ziggler - Dolph gets more impact than his opponent but have agree that Ziggler is the best seller WWE has now.. Just look how he made Great Khali look good.
Taker - Pile Driver - If done wrong opponents neck may get broken or hard hit on skull could permanently damage opponent even worse Death
Ric Flair - no idea how he got famous, dude can't wrestle. His all matches have the same routine.
Ortan RKO - again ortan gets more impact than his opponent. Technically Zero effect on the opponent Ortan Punt - Overrated/hardly makes a contact
Sleeper Holds - worse finishes.... u can clearly see the gap between the arms and opponent's neck.
Michelle McCool - I think I saw that move by AJ Styles long before McCool.
Christian - Most stupid move - technically you can't lock arms the ways christian does. Opponent just has to take one step back and his out of Kill Switch
Hogan - Leg Drop - the leg which makes contact on the ground take all impact (Best Leg Dropper - Yokozuna)
Batista - I find his version of power slam is the weakest of all. Check out Taker's version(Last Ride)
CM Punk - good finish. once he broke ray mysterio's nose with that move
Jericho - getting more impact than opponent. Technically hold isn't powerful, all opponent has to do is just stand.
Tyler Reks – Burning Hammer - Seriously - but have to admit, its definitely better than Angle Slam
Sheamus – Brogue Kick - never makes a contact
Bret Hitman Hart – Sharp Shooter - what can i say - He is best there is, the best there was and the best there ever will be.
John Cena – Attitude adjustment - thats just stupid - Cena reminds of RVD, who doesn't hit his opponent but wins
The Peoples Elbow - the most electrifying move..
all this is fake and just for entertainment - kids should be told. You don't want there hearts broken when they grow up.. I am one of those.. :( I remember when I was kid i used to argue with people that its real. Now I look like a idiot.
I am Glad that found somthing real - MMA :D
